title.raw: 《陳杞世家》 Houses of Chen and Qi

sentences.zh: 陳胡公滿者，虞帝舜之後也。

translations.literal: Chen Hu Gong Man, Emperor Shun's descendant.

sentences.zh: 昔舜為庶人時，堯妻之二女，居于媯汭，其後因為氏姓，姓媯氏。

translations.literal: Formerly Shun as commoner time, Yao married him two daughters, resided at Gui Rui, his descendants therefore became clan surname, surname Gui clan.

sentences.zh: 舜已崩，傳禹天下，而舜子商均為封國。

translations.literal: Shun already collapsed, transmitted Yu world, Shun son Shang Jun made enfeoffed country.

sentences.zh: 夏后之時，或失或續。

translations.literal: Xia Hou time, or lost or continued.

sentences.zh: 至于周武王克殷紂，乃復求舜後，得媯滿，封之於陳，以奉帝舜祀，是為胡公。

translations.literal: To Zhou Wu Wang conquered Yin Zhou, then again sought Shun descendants, obtained Gui Man, enfeoffed at Chen, to serve Emperor Shun sacrifices, this was Hu Gong.

Chen Hu Gong Man, Emperor Shun's descendant. Formerly Shun as commoner time, Yao married him two daughters, resided at Gui Rui, his descendants therefore became clan surname, surname Gui clan. Shun already collapsed, transmitted Yu world, Shun son Shang Jun made enfeoffed country. Xia Hou time, or lost or continued. To Zhou Wu Wang conquered Yin Zhou, then again sought Shun descendants, obtained Gui Man, enfeoffed at Chen, to serve Emperor Shun sacrifices, this was Hu Gong.

sentences.zh: 胡公卒，子申公犀侯立。

translations.literal: Hu Gong died, son Shen Gong Xi Hou established.

sentences.zh: 申公卒，弟相公皋羊立。

translations.literal: Shen Gong died, younger brother Xiang Gong Gao Yang established.

sentences.zh: 相公卒，立申公子突，是為孝公。

translations.literal: Xiang Gong died, established Shen Gong son Tu, this was Xiao Gong.

sentences.zh: 孝公卒，子慎公圉戎立。

translations.literal: Xiao Gong died, son Shen Gong Yu Rong established.

sentences.zh: 慎公當周厲王時。

translations.literal: Shen Gong during Zhou Li Wang time.

sentences.zh: 慎公卒，子幽公寧立。

translations.literal: Shen Gong died, son You Gong Ning established.

Hu Gong died, son Shen Gong Xi Hou established. Shen Gong died, younger brother Xiang Gong Gao Yang established. Xiang Gong died, established Shen Gong son Tu, this was Xiao Gong. Xiao Gong died, son Shen Gong Yu Rong established. Shen Gong during Zhou Li Wang time. Shen Gong died, son You Gong Ning established.

sentences.zh: 幽公十二年，周厲王奔于彘。

translations.literal: You Gong twelfth year, Zhou Li Wang fled to Zhu.
You Gong twelfth year, Zhou Li Wang fled to Zhu.

sentences.zh: 二十三年，幽公卒，子釐公孝立。

translations.literal: Twenty-third year, You Gong died, son Xi Gong Xiao established.

sentences.zh: 釐公六年，周宣王即位。

translations.literal: Xi Gong sixth year, Zhou Xuan Wang ascended position.

sentences.zh: 三十六年，釐公卒，子武公靈立。

translations.literal: Thirty-sixth year, Xi Gong died, son Wu Gong Ling established.

sentences.zh: 武公十五年卒，子夷公說立。

translations.literal: Wu Gong fifteenth year died, son Yi Gong Yue established.

sentences.zh: 是歲，周幽王即位。

translations.literal: This year, Zhou You Wang ascended position.

sentences.zh: 夷公三年卒，弟平公燮立。

translations.literal: Yi Gong third year died, younger brother Ping Gong Xie established.

sentences.zh: 平公七年，周幽王為犬戎所殺，周東徙。

translations.literal: Ping Gong seventh year, Zhou You Wang for Quan Rong assassinated, Zhou east moved.

sentences.zh: 秦始列為諸侯。

translations.literal: Qin began ranked as feudal lords.

Twenty-third year, You Gong died, son Xi Gong Xiao established. Xi Gong sixth year, Zhou Xuan Wang ascended position. Thirty-sixth year, Xi Gong died, son Wu Gong Ling established. Wu Gong fifteenth year died, son Yi Gong Yue established. This year, Zhou You Wang ascended position. Yi Gong third year died, younger brother Ping Gong Xie established. Ping Gong seventh year, Zhou You Wang for Quan Rong assassinated, Zhou east moved. Qin began ranked as feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 二十三年，平公卒，子文公圉立。

translations.literal: Twenty-third year, Ping Gong died, son Wen Gong Yu established.
Twenty-third year, Ping Gong died, son Wen Gong Yu established.

sentences.zh: 文公元年，取蔡女，生子佗。

translations.literal: Wen Gong first year, took Cai woman, gave birth son Tuo.

sentences.zh: 十年，文公卒，長子桓公鮑立。

translations.literal: Tenth year, Wen Gong died, eldest son Huan Gong Bao established.
Wen Gong first year, took Cai woman, gave birth son Tuo. Tenth year, Wen Gong died, eldest son Huan Gong Bao established.

sentences.zh: 桓公二十三年，魯隱公初立。

translations.literal: Huan Gong twenty-third year, Lu Yin Gong initially established.

sentences.zh: 二十六年，衛殺其君州吁。

translations.literal: Twenty-sixth year, Wei killed their lord Zhou Xu.

sentences.zh: 三十三年，魯弒其君隱公。

translations.literal: Thirty-third year, Lu assassinated their lord Yin Gong.
Huan Gong twenty-third year, Lu Yin Gong initially established. Twenty-sixth year, Wei killed their lord Zhou Xu. Thirty-third year, Lu assassinated their lord Yin Gong.

sentences.zh: 三十八年正月甲戌己丑，桓公鮑卒。

translations.literal: Thirty-eighth year first month Jia Xu Ji Chou, Huan Gong Bao died.

sentences.zh: 桓公弟佗，其母蔡女，故蔡人為佗殺五父及桓公太子免而立佗，是為厲公。

translations.literal: Huan Gong younger brother Tuo, his mother Cai woman, so Cai people for Tuo killed Wu Fu and Huan Gong crown prince Mian established Tuo, this was Li Gong.

sentences.zh: 桓公病而亂作，國人分散，故再赴。

translations.literal: Huan Gong ill disorder arose, country people dispersed, so double announcement.

Thirty-eighth year first month Jia Xu Ji Chou, Huan Gong Bao died. Huan Gong younger brother Tuo, his mother Cai woman, so Cai people for Tuo killed Wu Fu and Huan Gong crown prince Mian established Tuo, this was Li Gong. Huan Gong ill disorder arose, country people dispersed, so double announcement.

sentences.zh: 厲公二年，生子敬仲完。

translations.literal: Li Gong second year, gave birth son Jing Zhong Wan.

sentences.zh: 周太史過陳，陳厲公使以《周易》筮之，卦得觀之否：「是為觀國之光，利用賓于王。

translations.literal: Zhou great scribe passed Chen, Chen Li Gong made with Zhou Yi divine it, hexagram obtained Guan zhi Pi: 'This is observe country's light, beneficial guest king.

sentences.zh: 此其代陳有國乎？

translations.literal: This his replace Chen have country?

sentences.zh: 不在此，其在異國？

translations.literal: Not at this, his at different country?

sentences.zh: 非此其身，在其子孫。

translations.literal: Not this his body, at his descendants.

sentences.zh: 若在異國，必姜姓。

translations.literal: If at different country, must Jiang surname.

sentences.zh: 姜姓，太嶽之後。

translations.literal: Jiang surname, Tai Yue descendants.

sentences.zh: 物莫能兩大，陳衰，此其昌乎？」

translations.literal: Things cannot two great, Chen decline, this his prosper?'

Li Gong second year, gave birth son Jing Zhong Wan. Zhou great scribe passed Chen, Chen Li Gong made with Zhou Yi divine it, hexagram obtained Guan zhi Pi: 'This is observe country's light, beneficial guest king. This his replace Chen have country? Not at this, his at different country? Not this his body, at his descendants. If at different country, must Jiang surname. Jiang surname, Tai Yue descendants. Things cannot two great, Chen decline, this his prosper?'

sentences.zh: 厲公取蔡女，蔡女與蔡人亂，厲公數如蔡淫。

translations.literal: Li Gong took Cai woman, Cai woman with Cai people lewd, Li Gong several went Cai lewd.

sentences.zh: 七年，厲公所殺桓公太子免之三弟，長曰躍，中曰林，少曰杵臼，共令蔡人誘厲公以好女，與蔡人共殺厲公而立躍，是為利公。

translations.literal: Seventh year, Li Gong killed Huan Gong crown prince Mian three younger brothers, eldest Yue, middle Lin, youngest Chu Jiu, together ordered Cai people lure Li Gong with beautiful woman, with Cai people together killed Li Gong established Yue, this was Li Gong.

sentences.zh: 利公者，桓公子也。

translations.literal: Li Gong, Huan Gong son.

sentences.zh: 利公立五月卒，立中弟林，是為莊公。

translations.literal: Li Gong established five months died, established middle younger brother Lin, this was Zhuang Gong.

sentences.zh: 莊公七年卒，少弟杵臼立，是為宣公。

translations.literal: Zhuang Gong seventh year died, youngest younger brother Chu Jiu established, this was Xuan Gong.

Li Gong took Cai woman, Cai woman with Cai people lewd, Li Gong several went Cai lewd. Seventh year, Li Gong killed Huan Gong crown prince Mian three younger brothers, eldest Yue, middle Lin, youngest Chu Jiu, together ordered Cai people lure Li Gong with beautiful woman, with Cai people together killed Li Gong established Yue, this was Li Gong. Li Gong, Huan Gong son. Li Gong established five months died, established middle younger brother Lin, this was Zhuang Gong. Zhuang Gong seventh year died, youngest younger brother Chu Jiu established, this was Xuan Gong.

sentences.zh: 宣公三年，楚武王卒，楚始彊。

translations.literal: Xuan Gong third year, Chu Wu Wang died, Chu began strong.

sentences.zh: 十七年，周惠王娶陳女為后。

translations.literal: Seventeenth year, Zhou Hui Wang married Chen woman as queen.
Xuan Gong third year, Chu Wu Wang died, Chu began strong. Seventeenth year, Zhou Hui Wang married Chen woman as queen.

sentences.zh: 二十一年，宣公後有嬖姬生子款，欲立之，乃殺其太子御寇。

translations.literal: Twenty-first year, Xuan Gong favorite wife gave birth son Kuan, wished establish him, then killed his crown prince Yu Kou.

sentences.zh: 御寇素愛厲公子完，完懼禍及己，乃奔齊。

translations.literal: Yu Kou originally loved Li Gong son Wan, Wan feared calamity reach himself, then fled Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊桓公欲使陳完為卿，完曰：「羈旅之臣，幸得免負檐，君之惠也，不敢當高位。」

translations.literal: Qi Huan Gong wished make Chen Wan minister, Wan said: 'Exiled subject, fortunately obtained avoid shoulder burden, lord's favor, not dare receive high position.'

sentences.zh: 桓公使為工正。

translations.literal: Huan Gong made him artisan chief.

sentences.zh: 齊懿仲欲妻陳敬仲，卜之，占曰：「是謂鳳皇于飛，和鳴鏘鏘。

translations.literal: Qi Yi Zhong wished marry Chen Jing Zhong, divined it, omen said: 'This called phoenix fly, harmonious call clang clang.

sentences.zh: 有媯之後，將育于姜。

translations.literal: Have Gui descendants, will raise at Jiang.

sentences.zh: 五世其昌，并于正卿。

translations.literal: Five generations his prosper, equal to proper ministers.

sentences.zh: 八世之後，莫之與京。」

translations.literal: Eight generations after, none with compare capital.'

Twenty-first year, Xuan Gong favorite wife gave birth son Kuan, wished establish him, then killed his crown prince Yu Kou. Yu Kou originally loved Li Gong son Wan, Wan feared calamity reach himself, then fled Qi. Qi Huan Gong wished make Chen Wan minister, Wan said: 'Exiled subject, fortunately obtained avoid shoulder burden, lord's favor, not dare receive high position.' Huan Gong made him artisan chief. Qi Yi Zhong wished marry Chen Jing Zhong, divined it, omen said: 'This called phoenix fly, harmonious call clang clang. Have Gui descendants, will raise at Jiang. Five generations his prosper, equal to proper ministers. Eight generations after, none with compare capital.'

sentences.zh: 三十七年，齊桓公伐蔡，蔡敗；

translations.literal: Thirty-seventh year, Qi Huan Gong attacked Cai, Cai defeated;

sentences.zh: 南侵楚，至召陵，還過陳。

translations.literal: south invaded Chu, to Zhao Ling, returned passed Chen.

sentences.zh: 陳大夫轅濤涂惡其過陳，詐齊令出東道。

translations.literal: Chen grand master Yuan Tao Tu hated his passed Chen, cheated Qi ordered go eastern road.

sentences.zh: 東道惡，桓公怒，執陳轅濤涂。

translations.literal: Eastern road bad, Huan Gong angered, captured Chen Yuan Tao Tu.

sentences.zh: 是歲，晉獻公殺其太子申生。

translations.literal: This year, Jin Xian Gong killed his crown prince Shen Sheng.

Thirty-seventh year, Qi Huan Gong attacked Cai, Cai defeated; south invaded Chu, to Zhao Ling, returned passed Chen. Chen grand master Yuan Tao Tu hated his passed Chen, cheated Qi ordered go eastern road. Eastern road bad, Huan Gong angered, captured Chen Yuan Tao Tu. This year, Jin Xian Gong killed his crown prince Shen Sheng.

sentences.zh: 四十五年，宣公卒，子款立，是為穆公。

translations.literal: Forty-fifth year, Xuan Gong died, son Kuan established, this was Mu Gong.

sentences.zh: 穆公五年，齊桓公卒。

translations.literal: Mu Gong fifth year, Qi Huan Gong died.

sentences.zh: 十六年，晉文公敗楚師于城濮。

translations.literal: Sixteenth year, Jin Wen Gong defeated Chu troops at Cheng Pu.

sentences.zh: 是歲，穆公卒，子共公朔立。

translations.literal: This year, Mu Gong died, son Gong Gong Shuo established.

sentences.zh: 共公六年，楚太子商臣弒其父成王代立，是為穆王。

translations.literal: Gong Gong sixth year, Chu crown prince Shang Chen assassinated his father Cheng Wang replaced established, this was Mu Wang.

sentences.zh: 十一年，秦穆公卒。

translations.literal: Eleventh year, Qin Mu Gong died.

sentences.zh: 十八年，共公卒，子靈公平國立。

translations.literal: Eighteenth year, Gong Gong died, son Ling Gong Ping Guo established.

Forty-fifth year, Xuan Gong died, son Kuan established, this was Mu Gong. Mu Gong fifth year, Qi Huan Gong died. Sixteenth year, Jin Wen Gong defeated Chu troops at Cheng Pu. This year, Mu Gong died, son Gong Gong Shuo established. Gong Gong sixth year, Chu crown prince Shang Chen assassinated his father Cheng Wang replaced established, this was Mu Wang. Eleventh year, Qin Mu Gong died. Eighteenth year, Gong Gong died, son Ling Gong Ping Guo established.

sentences.zh: 靈公元年，楚莊王即位。

translations.literal: Ling Gong first year, Chu Zhuang Wang ascended position.

sentences.zh: 六年，楚伐陳。

translations.literal: Sixth year, Chu attacked Chen.

sentences.zh: 十年，陳及楚平。

translations.literal: Tenth year, Chen with Chu peace.
Ling Gong first year, Chu Zhuang Wang ascended position. Sixth year, Chu attacked Chen. Tenth year, Chen with Chu peace.

sentences.zh: 十四年，靈公與其大夫孔寧、儀行父皆通於夏姬，衷其衣以戲於朝。

translations.literal: Fourteenth year, Ling Gong with his grand masters Kong Ning, Yi Xing Fu all communicated Xia Ji, exchanged their clothes to play at court.

sentences.zh: 泄冶諫曰：「君臣淫亂，民何效焉？」

translations.literal: Xie Ye advised: 'Lord ministers lewd disorder, people what imitate?'

sentences.zh: 靈公以告二子，二子請殺泄冶，公弗禁，遂殺泄冶。

translations.literal: Ling Gong informed two sons, two sons requested kill Xie Ye, duke not prohibited, then killed Xie Ye.

sentences.zh: 十五年，靈公與二子飲於夏氏。

translations.literal: Fifteenth year, Ling Gong with two sons drank at Xia family.

sentences.zh: 公戲二子曰：「徵舒似汝。」

translations.literal: Duke played two sons said: 'Zheng Shu resembles you.'

sentences.zh: 二子曰：「亦似公。」

translations.literal: Two sons said: 'Also resembles duke.'

sentences.zh: 徵舒怒。

translations.literal: Zheng Shu angered.

sentences.zh: 靈公罷酒出，徵舒伏弩廏門射殺靈公。

translations.literal: Ling Gong stopped wine went out, Zheng Shu hid crossbow stable door shot killed Ling Gong.

sentences.zh: 孔寧、儀行父皆奔楚，靈公太子午奔晉。

translations.literal: Kong Ning, Yi Xing Fu all fled Chu, Ling Gong crown prince Wu fled Jin.

sentences.zh: 徵舒自立為陳侯。

translations.literal: Zheng Shu self established as Chen Hou.

sentences.zh: 徵舒，故陳大夫也。

translations.literal: Zheng Shu, originally Chen grand master.

sentences.zh: 夏姬，御叔之妻，舒之母也。

translations.literal: Xia Ji, Yu Shu wife, Shu's mother.

Fourteenth year, Ling Gong with his grand masters Kong Ning, Yi Xing Fu all communicated Xia Ji, exchanged their clothes to play at court. Xie Ye advised: 'Lord ministers lewd disorder, people what imitate?' Ling Gong informed two sons, two sons requested kill Xie Ye, duke not prohibited, then killed Xie Ye. Fifteenth year, Ling Gong with two sons drank at Xia family. Duke played two sons said: 'Zheng Shu resembles you.' Two sons said: 'Also resembles duke.' Zheng Shu angered. Ling Gong stopped wine went out, Zheng Shu hid crossbow stable door shot killed Ling Gong. Kong Ning, Yi Xing Fu all fled Chu, Ling Gong crown prince Wu fled Jin. Zheng Shu self established as Chen Hou. Zheng Shu, originally Chen grand master. Xia Ji, Yu Shu wife, Shu's mother.

sentences.zh: 成公元年冬，楚莊王為夏徵舒殺靈公，率諸侯伐陳。

translations.literal: Cheng Gong first year winter, Chu Zhuang Wang for Xia Zheng Shu killed Ling Gong, led feudal lords attacked Chen.

sentences.zh: 謂陳曰：「無驚，吾誅徵舒而已。」

translations.literal: Told Chen: 'Do not fear, I execute Zheng Shu only.'

sentences.zh: 已誅徵舒，因縣陳而有之，群臣畢賀。

translations.literal: Already executed Zheng Shu, because suspended Chen had it, group ministers all congratulated.

sentences.zh: 申叔時使於齊來還，獨不賀。

translations.literal: Shen Shu Shi sent to Qi came returned, alone not congratulated.

sentences.zh: 莊王問其故，對曰：「鄙語有之，牽牛徑人田，田主奪之牛。

translations.literal: Zhuang Wang asked its reason, answered said: 'Vulgar saying has it, lead ox enter person field, field master seize ox.

sentences.zh: 徑則有罪矣，奪之牛，不亦甚乎？

translations.literal: Enter then has crime, seize ox, not also excessive?

sentences.zh: 今王以徵舒為賊弒君，故徵兵諸侯，以義伐之，已而取之，以利其地，則後何以令於天下！

translations.literal: Now Wang with Zheng Shu as traitor assassinated lord, so requested troops feudal lords, with righteousness attacked it, already then took it, with profit its land, then after what with command world!

sentences.zh: 是以不賀。」

translations.literal: Therefore not congratulate.'

sentences.zh: 莊王曰：「善。」

translations.literal: Zhuang Wang said: 'Good.'

sentences.zh: 乃迎陳靈公太子午於晉而立之，復君陳如故，是為成公。

translations.literal: Then welcomed Chen Ling Gong crown prince Wu from Jin established him, restored ruled Chen as before, this was Cheng Gong.

sentences.zh: 孔子讀史記至楚復陳，曰：「賢哉楚莊王！

translations.literal: Kong Qiu read history records to Chu restored Chen, said: 'Worthy Chu Zhuang Wang!

sentences.zh: 輕千乘之國而重一言。」

translations.literal: Light thousand chariot country heavy one word.'

Cheng Gong first year winter, Chu Zhuang Wang for Xia Zheng Shu killed Ling Gong, led feudal lords attacked Chen. Told Chen: 'Do not fear, I execute Zheng Shu only.' Already executed Zheng Shu, because suspended Chen had it, group ministers all congratulated. Shen Shu Shi sent to Qi came returned, alone not congratulated. Zhuang Wang asked its reason, answered said: 'Vulgar saying has it, lead ox enter person field, field master seize ox. Enter then has crime, seize ox, not also excessive? Now Wang with Zheng Shu as traitor assassinated lord, so requested troops feudal lords, with righteousness attacked it, already then took it, with profit its land, then after what with command world! Therefore not congratulate.' Zhuang Wang said: 'Good.' Then welcomed Chen Ling Gong crown prince Wu from Jin established him, restored ruled Chen as before, this was Cheng Gong. Kong Qiu read history records to Chu restored Chen, said: 'Worthy Chu Zhuang Wang! Light thousand chariot country heavy one word.'

sentences.zh: ［二十］八年，楚莊王卒。

translations.literal: Twenty-eight year, Chu Zhuang Wang died.

sentences.zh: 二十九年，陳倍楚盟。

translations.literal: Twenty-ninth year, Chen betrayed Chu alliance.

sentences.zh: 三十年，楚共王伐陳。

translations.literal: Thirtieth year, Chu Gong Wang attacked Chen.

sentences.zh: 是歲，成公卒，子哀公弱立。

translations.literal: This year, Cheng Gong died, son Ai Gong Ruo established.

sentences.zh: 楚以陳喪，罷兵去。

translations.literal: Chu because Chen mourning, stopped troops left.

Twenty-eight year, Chu Zhuang Wang died. Twenty-ninth year, Chen betrayed Chu alliance. Thirtieth year, Chu Gong Wang attacked Chen. This year, Cheng Gong died, son Ai Gong Ruo established. Chu because Chen mourning, stopped troops left.

sentences.zh: 哀公三年，楚圍陳，復釋之。

translations.literal: Ai Gong third year, Chu surrounded Chen, again released it.

sentences.zh: 二十八年，楚公子圍弒其君郟敖自立，為靈王。

translations.literal: Twenty-eighth year, Chu gong zi Wei assassinated his wang Jia Ao self established, became Ling Wang.
Ai Gong third year, Chu surrounded Chen, again released it. Twenty-eighth year, Chu gong zi Wei assassinated his wang Jia Ao self established, became Ling Wang.

sentences.zh: 三十四年，初，哀公娶鄭，長姬生悼太子師，少姬生偃。

translations.literal: Thirty-fourth year, initially, Ai Gong married Zheng, eldest wife gave birth Dao crown prince Shi, youngest wife gave birth Yan.

sentences.zh: 二嬖妾，長妾生留，少妾生勝。

translations.literal: Two favored concubines, eldest concubine gave birth Liu, youngest concubine gave birth Sheng.

sentences.zh: 留有寵哀公，哀公屬之其弟司徒招。

translations.literal: Liu had favor Ai Gong, Ai Gong entrusted him his younger brother Si Tu Zhao.

sentences.zh: 哀公病，三月，招殺悼太子，立留為太子。

translations.literal: Ai Gong ill, third month, Zhao killed Dao crown prince, established Liu as crown prince.

sentences.zh: 哀公怒，欲誅招，招發兵圍守哀公，哀公自經殺。

translations.literal: Ai Gong angered, wished execute Zhao, Zhao sent troops surrounded guarded Ai Gong, Ai Gong self hanged killed.

sentences.zh: 招卒立留為陳君。

translations.literal: Zhao finally established Liu as Chen lord.

sentences.zh: 四月，陳使使赴楚。

translations.literal: Fourth month, Chen sent envoy announced Chu.

sentences.zh: 楚靈王聞陳亂，乃殺陳使者，使公子棄疾發兵伐陳，陳君留奔鄭。

translations.literal: Chu Ling Wang heard Chen disorder, then killed Chen envoy, made gong zi Qi Ji sent troops attacked Chen, Chen lord Liu fled Zheng.

sentences.zh: 九月，楚圍陳。

translations.literal: Ninth month, Chu surrounded Chen.

sentences.zh: 十一月，滅陳。

translations.literal: Eleventh month, extinguished Chen.

sentences.zh: 使棄疾為陳公。

translations.literal: Made Qi Ji as Chen Gong.

Thirty-fourth year, initially, Ai Gong married Zheng, eldest wife gave birth Dao crown prince Shi, youngest wife gave birth Yan. Two favored concubines, eldest concubine gave birth Liu, youngest concubine gave birth Sheng. Liu had favor Ai Gong, Ai Gong entrusted him his younger brother Si Tu Zhao. Ai Gong ill, third month, Zhao killed Dao crown prince, established Liu as crown prince. Ai Gong angered, wished execute Zhao, Zhao sent troops surrounded guarded Ai Gong, Ai Gong self hanged killed. Zhao finally established Liu as Chen lord. Fourth month, Chen sent envoy announced Chu. Chu Ling Wang heard Chen disorder, then killed Chen envoy, made gong zi Qi Ji sent troops attacked Chen, Chen lord Liu fled Zheng. Ninth month, Chu surrounded Chen. Eleventh month, extinguished Chen. Made Qi Ji as Chen Gong.

sentences.zh: 招之殺悼太子也，太子之子名吳，出奔晉。

translations.literal: Zhao's killed Dao crown prince, crown prince son named Wu, went fleeing Jin.

sentences.zh: 晉平公問太史趙曰：「陳遂亡乎？」

translations.literal: Jin Ping Gong asked great scribe Zhao said: 'Chen then perish?'

sentences.zh: 對曰：「陳，顓頊之族。

translations.literal: Answered said: 'Chen, Zhuan Xu clan.

sentences.zh: 陳氏得政於齊，乃卒亡。

translations.literal: Chen clan obtained government at Qi, then finally perish.

sentences.zh: 自幕至于瞽瞍，無違命。

translations.literal: From Mu to Gu Sou, no violated command.

sentences.zh: 舜重之以明德。

translations.literal: Shun weighed with bright virtue.

sentences.zh: 至於遂，世世守之。

translations.literal: To Sui, generations guarded it.

sentences.zh: 及胡公，周賜之姓，使祀虞帝。

translations.literal: To Hu Gong, Zhou granted surname, made sacrifice Yu emperor.

sentences.zh: 且盛德之後，必百世祀。

translations.literal: Moreover flourishing virtue descendants, must hundred generations sacrifice.

sentences.zh: 虞之世未也，其在齊乎？」

translations.literal: Yu world not ended, his at Qi?'

Zhao's killed Dao crown prince, crown prince son named Wu, went fleeing Jin. Jin Ping Gong asked great scribe Zhao said: 'Chen then perish?' Answered said: 'Chen, Zhuan Xu clan. Chen clan obtained government at Qi, then finally perish. From Mu to Gu Sou, no violated command. Shun weighed with bright virtue. To Sui, generations guarded it. To Hu Gong, Zhou granted surname, made sacrifice Yu emperor. Moreover flourishing virtue descendants, must hundred generations sacrifice. Yu world not ended, his at Qi?'

sentences.zh: 楚靈王滅陳五歲，楚公子棄疾弒靈王代立，是為平王。

translations.literal: Chu Ling Wang extinguished Chen five years, Chu gong zi Qi Ji assassinated Ling Wang replaced established, this was Ping Wang.

sentences.zh: 平王初立，欲得和諸侯，乃求故陳悼太子師之子吳，立為陳侯，是為惠公。

translations.literal: Ping Wang initially established, wished obtain peace feudal lords, then sought former Chen Dao crown prince Shi son Wu, established as Chen Hou, this was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 惠公立，探續哀公卒時年而為元，空籍五歲矣。

translations.literal: Hui Gong established, explored continued Ai Gong died year made beginning, empty register five years.

Chu Ling Wang extinguished Chen five years, Chu gong zi Qi Ji assassinated Ling Wang replaced established, this was Ping Wang. Ping Wang initially established, wished obtain peace feudal lords, then sought former Chen Dao crown prince Shi son Wu, established as Chen Hou, this was Hui Gong. Hui Gong established, explored continued Ai Gong died year made beginning, empty register five years.

sentences.zh: 十年，陳火。

translations.literal: Tenth year, Chen fire.

sentences.zh: 十五年，吳王僚使公子光伐陳，取胡、沈而去。

translations.literal: Fifteenth year, Wu Wang Liao made gong zi Guang attacked Chen, took Hu, Shen left.

sentences.zh: 二十八年，吳王闔閭與子胥敗楚入郢。

translations.literal: Twenty-eighth year, Wu Wang He Lu with Zi Xu defeated Chu entered Ying.

sentences.zh: 是年，惠公卒，子懷公柳立。

translations.literal: This year, Hui Gong died, son Huai Gong Liu established.

Tenth year, Chen fire. Fifteenth year, Wu Wang Liao made gong zi Guang attacked Chen, took Hu, Shen left. Twenty-eighth year, Wu Wang He Lu with Zi Xu defeated Chu entered Ying. This year, Hui Gong died, son Huai Gong Liu established.

sentences.zh: 懷公元年，吳破楚，在郢，召陳侯。

translations.literal: Huai Gong first year, Wu broke Chu, in Ying, summoned Chen Hou.

sentences.zh: 陳侯欲往，大夫曰：「吳新得意；

translations.literal: Chen Hou wished go, grand masters said: 'Wu newly obtained will;

sentences.zh: 楚王雖亡，與陳有故，不可倍。」

translations.literal: Chu wang though perished, with Chen have old, cannot betray.'

sentences.zh: 懷公乃以疾謝吳。

translations.literal: Huai Gong then with illness declined Wu.

sentences.zh: 四年，吳復召懷公。

translations.literal: Fourth year, Wu again summoned Huai Gong.

sentences.zh: 懷公恐，如吳。

translations.literal: Huai Gong feared, went Wu.

sentences.zh: 吳怒其前不往，留之，因卒吳。

translations.literal: Wu angered his previous not go, detained him, because died Wu.

sentences.zh: 陳乃立懷公之子越，是為湣公。

translations.literal: Chen then established Huai Gong son Yue, this was Min Gong.

Huai Gong first year, Wu broke Chu, in Ying, summoned Chen Hou. Chen Hou wished go, grand masters said: 'Wu newly obtained will; Chu wang though perished, with Chen have old, cannot betray.' Huai Gong then with illness declined Wu. Fourth year, Wu again summoned Huai Gong. Huai Gong feared, went Wu. Wu angered his previous not go, detained him, because died Wu. Chen then established Huai Gong son Yue, this was Min Gong.

sentences.zh: 湣公六年，孔子適陳。

translations.literal: Min Gong sixth year, Kong Qiu went Chen.

sentences.zh: 吳王夫差伐陳，取三邑而去。

translations.literal: Wu Wang Fu Cha attacked Chen, took three yi left.

sentences.zh: 十三年，吳復來伐陳，陳告急楚，楚昭王來救，軍於城父，吳師去。

translations.literal: Thirteenth year, Wu again came attacked Chen, Chen urgently told Chu, Chu Zhao Wang came save, stationed at Cheng Fu, Wu troops left.

sentences.zh: 是年，楚昭王卒於城父。

translations.literal: This year, Chu Zhao Wang died at Cheng Fu.

sentences.zh: 時孔子在陳。

translations.literal: At time Kong Qiu in Chen.

sentences.zh: 十五年，宋滅曹。

translations.literal: Fifteenth year, Song extinguished Cao.

sentences.zh: 十六年，吳王夫差伐齊，敗之艾陵，使人召陳侯。

translations.literal: Sixteenth year, Wu Wang Fu Cha attacked Qi, defeated it Ai Ling, made person summoned Chen Hou.

sentences.zh: 陳侯恐，如吳。

translations.literal: Chen Hou feared, went Wu.

sentences.zh: 楚伐陳。

translations.literal: Chu attacked Chen.

sentences.zh: 二十一年，齊田常弒其君簡公。

translations.literal: Twenty-first year, Qi Tian Chang assassinated their lord Jian Gong.

sentences.zh: 二十三年，楚之白公勝殺令尹子西、子綦，襲惠王。

translations.literal: Twenty-third year, Chu Bai Gong Sheng killed Ling Yin Zi Xi, Zi Qi, attacked Hui Wang.

sentences.zh: 葉公攻敗白公，白公自殺。

translations.literal: Ye Gong attacked defeated Bai Gong, Bai Gong self killed.

Min Gong sixth year, Kong Qiu went Chen. Wu Wang Fu Cha attacked Chen, took three yi left. Thirteenth year, Wu again came attacked Chen, Chen urgently told Chu, Chu Zhao Wang came save, stationed at Cheng Fu, Wu troops left. This year, Chu Zhao Wang died at Cheng Fu. At time Kong Qiu in Chen. Fifteenth year, Song extinguished Cao. Sixteenth year, Wu Wang Fu Cha attacked Qi, defeated it Ai Ling, made person summoned Chen Hou. Chen Hou feared, went Wu. Chu attacked Chen. Twenty-first year, Qi Tian Chang assassinated their lord Jian Gong. Twenty-third year, Chu Bai Gong Sheng killed Ling Yin Zi Xi, Zi Qi, attacked Hui Wang. Ye Gong attacked defeated Bai Gong, Bai Gong self killed.

sentences.zh: 二十四年，楚惠王復國，以兵北伐，殺陳湣公，遂滅陳而有之。

translations.literal: Twenty-fourth year, Chu Hui Wang restored country, with troops north attacked, killed Chen Min Gong, then extinguished Chen had it.

sentences.zh: 是歲，孔子卒。

translations.literal: This year, Kong Qiu died.
Twenty-fourth year, Chu Hui Wang restored country, with troops north attacked, killed Chen Min Gong, then extinguished Chen had it. This year, Kong Qiu died.

sentences.zh: 杞東樓公者，夏后禹之後苗裔也。

translations.literal: Qi Dong Lou Gong, Xia Hou Yu descendants Miao yi.

sentences.zh: 殷時或封或絕。

translations.literal: Yin time or enfeoffed or cut off.

sentences.zh: 周武王克殷紂，求禹之後，得東樓公，封之於杞，以奉夏后氏祀。

translations.literal: Zhou Wu Wang conquered Yin Zhou, sought Yu descendants, obtained Dong Lou Gong, enfeoffed at Qi, to serve Xia Hou clan sacrifices.

Qi Dong Lou Gong, Xia Hou Yu descendants Miao yi. Yin time or enfeoffed or cut off. Zhou Wu Wang conquered Yin Zhou, sought Yu descendants, obtained Dong Lou Gong, enfeoffed at Qi, to serve Xia Hou clan sacrifices.

sentences.zh: 東樓公生西樓公，西樓公生題公，題公生謀娶公。

translations.literal: Dong Lou Gong gave birth Xi Lou Gong, Xi Lou Gong gave birth Ti Gong, Ti Gong gave birth Mou Qu Gong.

sentences.zh: 謀娶公當周厲王時。

translations.literal: Mou Qu Gong during Zhou Li Wang time.

sentences.zh: 謀娶公生武公。

translations.literal: Mou Qu Gong gave birth Wu Gong.

sentences.zh: 武公立四十七年卒，子靖公立。

translations.literal: Wu Gong established forty-seven years died, son Jing Gong established.

sentences.zh: 靖公二十三年卒，子共公立。

translations.literal: Jing Gong twenty-three years died, son Gong Gong established.

sentences.zh: 共公八年卒，子德公立。

translations.literal: Gong Gong eight years died, son De Gong established.

sentences.zh: 德公十八年卒，弟桓公姑容立。

translations.literal: De Gong eighteen years died, younger brother Huan Gong Gu Rong established.

sentences.zh: 桓公十七年卒，子孝公丐立。

translations.literal: Huan Gong seventeen years died, son Xiao Gong Gai established.

sentences.zh: 孝公十七年卒，弟文公益姑立。

translations.literal: Xiao Gong seventeen years died, younger brother Wen Gong Yi Gu established.

sentences.zh: 文公十四年卒，弟平公郁立。

translations.literal: Wen Gong fourteen years died, younger brother Ping Gong Yu established.

sentences.zh: 平公十八年卒，子悼公成立。

translations.literal: Ping Gong eighteen years died, son Dao Gong Cheng established.

sentences.zh: 悼公十二年卒，子隱公乞立。

translations.literal: Dao Gong twelve years died, son Yin Gong Qi established.

sentences.zh: 七月，隱公弟遂弒隱公自立，是為釐公。

translations.literal: Seventh month, Yin Gong younger brother Sui assassinated Yin Gong self established, this was Xi Gong.

sentences.zh: 釐公十九年卒，子湣公維立。

translations.literal: Xi Gong nineteen years died, son Min Gong Wei established.

sentences.zh: 湣公十五年，楚惠王滅陳。

translations.literal: Min Gong fifteenth year, Chu Hui Wang extinguished Chen.

sentences.zh: 十六年，湣公弟閼路弒湣公代立，是為哀公。

translations.literal: Sixteenth year, Min Gong younger brother Yan Lu assassinated Min Gong replaced established, this was Ai Gong.

sentences.zh: 哀公立十年卒，湣公子敕立，是為出公。

translations.literal: Ai Gong established ten years died, Min Gong son Chi established, this was Chu Gong.

sentences.zh: 出公十二年卒，子簡公春立。

translations.literal: Chu Gong twelve years died, son Jian Gong Chun established.

sentences.zh: 立一年，楚惠王之四十四年，滅杞。

translations.literal: Established one year, Chu Hui Wang forty-fourth year, extinguished Qi.

sentences.zh: 杞後陳亡三十四年。

translations.literal: Qi after Chen perished thirty-four years.

Dong Lou Gong gave birth Xi Lou Gong, Xi Lou Gong gave birth Ti Gong, Ti Gong gave birth Mou Qu Gong. Mou Qu Gong during Zhou Li Wang time. Mou Qu Gong gave birth Wu Gong. Wu Gong established forty-seven years died, son Jing Gong established. Jing Gong twenty-three years died, son Gong Gong established. Gong Gong eight years died, son De Gong established. De Gong eighteen years died, younger brother Huan Gong Gu Rong established. Huan Gong seventeen years died, son Xiao Gong Gai established. Xiao Gong seventeen years died, younger brother Wen Gong Yi Gu established. Wen Gong fourteen years died, younger brother Ping Gong Yu established. Ping Gong eighteen years died, son Dao Gong Cheng established. Dao Gong twelve years died, son Yin Gong Qi established. Seventh month, Yin Gong younger brother Sui assassinated Yin Gong self established, this was Xi Gong. Xi Gong nineteen years died, son Min Gong Wei established. Min Gong fifteenth year, Chu Hui Wang extinguished Chen. Sixteenth year, Min Gong younger brother Yan Lu assassinated Min Gong replaced established, this was Ai Gong. Ai Gong established ten years died, Min Gong son Chi established, this was Chu Gong. Chu Gong twelve years died, son Jian Gong Chun established. Established one year, Chu Hui Wang forty-fourth year, extinguished Qi. Qi after Chen perished thirty-four years.

sentences.zh: 杞小微，其事不足稱述。

translations.literal: Qi small minute, its affairs insufficient worthy describe.
Qi small minute, its affairs insufficient worthy describe.

sentences.zh: 舜之後，周武王封之陳，至楚惠王滅之，有世家言。

translations.literal: Shun descendants, Zhou Wu Wang enfeoffed at Chen, to Chu Hui Wang extinguished it, has genealogy speaks.

sentences.zh: 禹之後，周武王封之杞，楚惠王滅之，有世家言。

translations.literal: Yu descendants, Zhou Wu Wang enfeoffed at Qi, Chu Hui Wang extinguished it, has genealogy speaks.

sentences.zh: 契之後為殷，殷有本紀言。

translations.literal: Qi descendants became Yin, Yin has basic record speaks.

sentences.zh: 殷破，周封其後於宋，齊湣王滅之，有世家言。

translations.literal: Yin broken, Zhou enfeoffed its descendants at Song, Qi Min Wang extinguished it, has genealogy speaks.

sentences.zh: 后稷之後為周，秦昭王滅之，有本紀言。

translations.literal: Hou Ji descendants became Zhou, Qin Zhao Wang extinguished it, has basic record speaks.

sentences.zh: 皋陶之後，或封英、六，楚穆王滅之，無譜。

translations.literal: Gao Tao descendants, or enfeoffed Ying, Liu, Chu Mu Wang extinguished them, no genealogy.

sentences.zh: 伯夷之後，至周武王復封於齊，曰太公望，陳氏滅之，有世家言。

translations.literal: Bo Yi descendants, to Zhou Wu Wang again enfeoffed at Qi, called Tai Gong Wang, Chen clan extinguished it, has genealogy speaks.

sentences.zh: 伯翳之後，至周平王時封為秦，項羽滅之，有本紀言。

translations.literal: Bo Yi descendants, to Zhou Ping Wang time enfeoffed as Qin, Xiang Yu extinguished it, has basic record speaks.

sentences.zh: 垂、益、夔、龍，其後不知所封，不見也。

translations.literal: Chui, Yi, Kui, Long, their descendants not know enfeoffed where, not seen.

sentences.zh: 右十一人者，皆唐虞之際名有功德臣也；

translations.literal: Right eleven people, all Tang Yu time famous meritorious virtue ministers;

sentences.zh: 其五人之後皆至帝王，餘乃為顯諸侯。

translations.literal: their five people's descendants all to emperor kings, remainder became illustrious feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 滕、薛、騶，夏、殷、周之閒封也，小，不足齒列，弗論也。

translations.literal: Teng, Xue, Zou, Xia, Yin, Zhou between enfeoffed, small, insufficient worthy list, not discuss.

Shun descendants, Zhou Wu Wang enfeoffed at Chen, to Chu Hui Wang extinguished it, has genealogy speaks. Yu descendants, Zhou Wu Wang enfeoffed at Qi, Chu Hui Wang extinguished it, has genealogy speaks. Qi descendants became Yin, Yin has basic record speaks. Yin broken, Zhou enfeoffed its descendants at Song, Qi Min Wang extinguished it, has genealogy speaks. Hou Ji descendants became Zhou, Qin Zhao Wang extinguished it, has basic record speaks. Gao Tao descendants, or enfeoffed Ying, Liu, Chu Mu Wang extinguished them, no genealogy. Bo Yi descendants, to Zhou Wu Wang again enfeoffed at Qi, called Tai Gong Wang, Chen clan extinguished it, has genealogy speaks. Bo Yi descendants, to Zhou Ping Wang time enfeoffed as Qin, Xiang Yu extinguished it, has basic record speaks. Chui, Yi, Kui, Long, their descendants not know enfeoffed where, not seen. Right eleven people, all Tang Yu time famous meritorious virtue ministers; their five people's descendants all to emperor kings, remainder became illustrious feudal lords. Teng, Xue, Zou, Xia, Yin, Zhou between enfeoffed, small, insufficient worthy list, not discuss.

sentences.zh: 周武王時，侯伯尚千餘人。

translations.literal: Zhou Wu Wang time, hou bo still over thousand people.

sentences.zh: 及幽、厲之後，諸侯力攻相并。

translations.literal: To You, Li after, feudal lords force attacked mutually annexed.

sentences.zh: 江、黃、胡、沈之屬，不可勝數，故弗采著于傳（上）［云］。

translations.literal: Jiang, Huang, Hu, Shen kind, cannot win count, so not collected recorded at transmission.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：舜之德可謂至矣！

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: Shun virtue can call utmost!

sentences.zh: 禪位於夏，而後世血食者歷三代。

translations.literal: Yielded position to Xia, later generations blood food lasted three dynasties.

sentences.zh: 及楚滅陳，而田常得政於齊，卒為建國，百世不絕，苗裔茲茲，有土者不乏焉。

translations.literal: To Chu extinguished Chen, Tian Chang obtained government at Qi, finally made establish country, hundred generations not cut off, Miao yi flourishing, having land not lack.

sentences.zh: 至禹，於周則杞，微甚，不足數也。

translations.literal: To Yu, at Zhou then Qi, minute very, insufficient count.

sentences.zh: 楚惠王滅杞，其後越王句踐興。

translations.literal: Chu Hui Wang extinguished Qi, its after Yue Wang Gou Jian rose.

Zhou Wu Wang time, hou bo still over thousand people. To You, Li after, feudal lords force attacked mutually annexed. Jiang, Huang, Hu, Shen kind, cannot win count, so not collected recorded at transmission. Grand Historian said: Shun virtue can call utmost! Yielded position to Xia, later generations blood food lasted three dynasties. To Chu extinguished Chen, Tian Chang obtained government at Qi, finally made establish country, hundred generations not cut off, Miao yi flourishing, having land not lack. To Yu, at Zhou then Qi, minute very, insufficient count. Chu Hui Wang extinguished Qi, its after Yue Wang Gou Jian rose.
